div1.head: Last photograph of Walter Reed [with Army Medical School Class of 1901-1902. William Borden, who operated on him, is standing next to him], 1902
div1.p:
COL. CHARLES SMART - COL. W.H. FORWOOD - COL. CALVIN DEWITT
LT. COL. J. VANR. HOFF - MAJ. WM. BORDEN - MAJ. WALTER REED - LT. COL. L. LAGARDE - CAPT. FREDERICK REYNOLDS - CAPT. F. L. MUNSON
BROOKE - P. HALLORAN - W. WOODALL - R. METCALFE - E. RUFFNER - J. CHAFFEE - C. KOERPER - J. PHALEN - L. KREBS - C. GEER - R. O'CONNOR
SMART - V. SWEASY - G. JEAN - P. BOYER - G. HEARD - K. NELSON - M. DELANEY - W. EASTMAN - R. PATTERSON - J. HALL - A. LINE - C. RAGAN
